name: Look Out (MGauget-Berlioz, Yelaw, PantherWoman)
description:
In Look out, you embody a security gard who helps travellers to find their lost stuff in the train station ! 


Made as part of the Global Game Jam 2021.  Theme : "Lost and Found" The crew : Matthieu Gauget Berlioz : Programming / Game Design / Graphics / Music / UX Jeanneva Tarrier-Walters : Graphics / Game Design / UX Minna Clair : Game Design / Sound Design / UX / The Train
